import React from "react"; import { FaFacebook, FaInstagram, FaTwitter } from "react-icons/fa"; import Logo from "./assessts/Logo-1.png"; // Adjust the path as necessary const Footer = () => { return (
{/* Logo and Name */}

Curry Express

{/* Social Links */}
{/* Navigation Links */}
Home Menu About Us
{/* Restaurant Hours */}

Restaurant Hours

Friday: 11 AM–8 PM

Saturday: 11 AM–8 PM

Sunday: 12–5 PM

Monday: 11 AM–8 PM

Tuesday: 11 AM–8 PM

Wednesday: 11 AM–8 PM

Thursday: 11 AM–8 PM

{/* Contact Us */}

Contact Us

Phone: +1 217-542-5114

Email: info@curryexpress.com

); }; export default Footer;
